Cherrycake\DatabaseRowMysql

DatabaseRow

Class that represents a row retrieved from a query to a database, specific for MySql

    Methods

    public

    • treatFieldData() — Returns a treated version of the given data according to the given \Cherrycake\Modules\DATABASE_FIELD_TYPE_* fieldType. $data contains data as is came out from the database.

    Inherited from Cherrycake\DatabaseRow

    public

    • getData() — Returns a hash array of all the data. If $fields is specified, the returned data is treated accordingly.
    • getField() — getField
